rules_text:
Spawn of Andazir enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.
Lionize {2}{G} [i]({2}{G}, Exile this card from your hand: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and it gains the following abilities until end of turn. You may cast this card on a later turn from exile.)[/i]
Whenever this creature deals damage to a player or noncreature permanent, double the number of +1/+1
counters on it.
